network_io

Class NetworkObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • network_io.NetworkObserver

  • public class NetworkObserver
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which provides the tracking of Internet state and allowing the current Activity to repose the changing of Internet state.
    Author:
    xuping

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NetworkObserver()
      Construct an NetworkObsever object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setObserver(AllTopicPageActivity activity)
      Will be called when the Internet is connected, start check if the Internet goes off each 5 seconds, if the Internet goes off, then stop checking and call refresh method in the Activity.
      void setObserver(CommentPageActivity activity)
      Will be called when the Internet is connected, start check if the Internet goes off each 5 seconds, if the Internet goes off, then stop checking and call refresh method in the Activity.
      void startObservation(AllTopicPageActivity activity)
      Will be called when the Internet is not connected, start check if the Internet connects each 5 seconds, if the Internet is connected, then stop checking and call refresh method in the Activity.
      void startObservation(CommentPageActivity activity)
      Will be called when the Internet is not connected, start check if the Internet connects each 5 seconds, if the Internet is connected, then stop checking and call refresh method in the Activity.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • startObservation

        public void startObservation(AllTopicPageActivity activity)
        Will be called when the Internet is not connected, start check if the Internet connects each 5 seconds, if the Internet is connected, then stop checking and call refresh method in the Activity.
        Parameters:
        activity - : AllTopicPageActivity where the function will be called.

      • startObservation

        public void startObservation(CommentPageActivity activity)
        Will be called when the Internet is not connected, start check if the Internet connects each 5 seconds, if the Internet is connected, then stop checking and call refresh method in the Activity.
        Parameters:
        activity - : CommentPageActivity where the function will be called.

        Will be called when the Internet is connected, start check if the Internet goes off each 5 seconds, if the Internet goes off, then stop checking and call refresh method in the Activity.

        activity - : AllTopicPageActivity where the function will be called.
